net.cloud.client.event.shutdown.hooks

Class GraphicShutdownHook

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cloud.client.event.shutdown.hooks.GraphicShutdownHook
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ShutdownHook

    public class GraphicShutdownHook
extends java.lang.Object
implements ShutdownHook
    This hook will stop a CloudGfx system from drawing. After this hook is shutdown, the graphics will no longer be redrawn.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private DrawLogic drawLogic
      The object dealing with calling repaint
      private java.lang.Thread drawThread
      The thread the draw logic is running on

    • Constructor Summary

      GraphicShutdownHook(DrawLogic drawLogic, java.lang.Thread drawThread)
      Create a new shutdown hook for a CloudGfx system.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void shutdown(java.io.PrintWriter out)
      Tell the graphics attached to this hook to stop redrawing itself.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphicShutdownHook

        public GraphicShutdownHook(DrawLogic drawLogic,
                           java.lang.Thread drawThread)
        Create a new shutdown hook for a CloudGfx system. When this hook is run, it will stop the graphics from being redrawn.
        Parameters:
        drawLogic - The object dealing with calling repaint
        drawThread - The thread the draw logic is running on

    • Method Detail

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown(java.io.PrintWriter out)
              throws ShutdownException
        Tell the graphics attached to this hook to stop redrawing itself. This method will return immediately.
        Specified by:
        shutdown in interface ShutdownHook
        Parameters:
        out - A PrintWriter to which status information will be output
        Throws:
        ShutdownException - If the shutdown process encountered an exception
